{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Ice shard | class = HeadFX2 | game = Heretic }}[[Classes]]: HeadFX2
The ice shards created when an [[Classes:Ironlich|iron lich]]'s [[Classes:HeadFX1|ice ball]] explodes on impact. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR HeadFX2 { {{Property|Radius}} 12 {{Property|Height}} 6 {{Property|Speed}} 8 {{Property|Damage}} 3 {{Property|Projectile}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEIMPACT}} -{{Flag|ACTIVATEPCROSS}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add States { Spawn: FX05 HIJ 6 Bright Loop Death: FX05 DEFG 5 Bright Stop } }
